# How to use
```ruby
api = Api.new('bitfinex')

api.ticker 'fUSD'
# => [0.000249013698630137, 0.00025, 30, 11889241.49534479, 0.00020437, 2, 293448.13073034, 4.3e-07, 0.0018, 0.000245, 130784015.59195606, 0.00032, 5.6e-07, nil, nil, 24872536.98375192]

api.tickers ['tBTCUSD', 'tLTCUSD', 'fUSD']
# => [["tBTCUSD", 6609, 38.38015683, 6610.8, 51.849324980000006, 1140.5, 0.2091, 6594.6, 33174.90384385, 6781, 5400.64834993], ["tLTCUSD", 41.793, 3022.20089887, 41.919, 2312.7853802799996, 6.719, 0.1916, 41.793, 143598.1259946, 42.58, 34.8], ["fUSD", 0.000249013698630137, 0.00025, 30, 11889241.49534479, 0.00020437, 2, 293448.13073034, 4.3e-07, 0.0018, 0.000245, 130784015.59195606, 0.00032, 5.6e-07, nil, nil, 24872536.98375192]]
```
